title: Mechanical Properties of Materials
description:
Stress and strain of material; Elastic deformation: Young’s modulus,
Poisson’s ratio, stress-strain relation, stiffness/compliance matrix; Dislocations: Edge/screw/mixed dislocation, burgers vectors, twining, stress field of dislocation, dislocation interaction; Plastic deformation of single and polycrystalline materials: Schmid’s law, plastic flow; Inelastic deformation:
Viscosity, deformation of inorganic glasses, deformation of noncrystalline and crystalline polymers; Mechanical fracture: ductile and brittle facture, creep, fatigue; Testing methods, Introductory mechanics of materials.
prerequisite: EG1109FC/EG1109 or MLE1101 or MLE2101 or MLE1111 or MLE1001 or MLE1002
